channel.title: Hengyuan Xu – Daily
channel.description: Recent content in Daily on Hengyuan Xu

item.title: First Science Experience
item.description:
Everyone has their first time, and so do I. Many of them are memorable, and many are not. Mine, is more than memorable. It is transformative.

Sounds like a cliché. But this is indeed a story I need to tell. You see, I come from a small town in China, where the only thing we can do to change our fate is to study hard and try to get good grades. We are called “small-town test taker”, which means all we are capable of doing is taking tests. And indeed we are, and I was, until that day.
